00124 #ifndef __TOMMYHASHTBL_H
00125 #define __TOMMYHASHTBL_H
00126 
00127 #include "tommyhash.h"
00128 
00129 /******************************************************************************/
00130 /* hashtable */
00131 
00136 typedef tommy_node tommy_hashtable_node;
00137 
00141 typedef struct tommy_hashtable_struct {
00142         tommy_hashtable_node** bucket; 
00143         unsigned bucket_max; 
00144         unsigned bucket_mask; 
00145         unsigned count; 
00146 } tommy_hashtable;
00147 
00152 void tommy_hashtable_init(tommy_hashtable* hashtable, unsigned bucket_max);
00153 
00157 void tommy_hashtable_done(tommy_hashtable* hashtable);
00158 
00162 void tommy_hashtable_insert(tommy_hashtable* hashtable, tommy_hashtable_node* node, void* data, tommy_hash_t hash);
00163 
00176 void* tommy_hashtable_remove(tommy_hashtable* hashtable, tommy_compare_func* cmp, const void* cmp_arg, tommy_hash_t hash);
00177 
00186 tommy_inline tommy_hashtable_node* tommy_hashtable_bucket(tommy_hashtable* hashtable, tommy_hash_t hash)
00187 {
00188         return hashtable->bucket[hash & hashtable->bucket_mask];
00189 }
00190 
00201 tommy_inline void* tommy_hashtable_search(tommy_hashtable* hashtable, tommy_compare_func* cmp, const void* cmp_arg, tommy_hash_t hash)
00202 {
00203         tommy_hashtable_node* i = tommy_hashtable_bucket(hashtable, hash);
00204         while (i) {
00205                 /* we first check if the hash matches, as in the same bucket we may have multiples hash values */
00206                 if (i->key == hash && cmp(cmp_arg, i->data) == 0)
00207                         return i->data;
00208                 i = i->next;
00209         }
00210         return 0;
00211 }
00212 
00218 void* tommy_hashtable_remove_existing(tommy_hashtable* hashtable, tommy_hashtable_node* node);
00219 
00223 tommy_inline unsigned tommy_hashtable_count(tommy_hashtable* hashtable)
00224 {
00225         return hashtable->count;
00226 }
00227 
00232 tommy_size_t tommy_hashtable_memory_usage(tommy_hashtable* hashtable);
00233
